${ModID}:QuickFix.NAME: Quick Fix
${ModID}:QuickFix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:RedHotHammer.NAME: Red-Hot Hammer
${ModID}:RedHotHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:HeartOfTheForge.NAME: Heart of the Forge
${ModID}:HeartOfTheForge.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Gain{!M!|>1= !M!} [E]. When Retained, Upgrade this. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CarelessSwing.NAME: Careless Swing
${ModID}:CarelessSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random *Unupgraded card in your hand.

${ModID}:SetUpShop.NAME: Set Up Shop
${ModID}:SetUpShop.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade !M! cards from your draw or discard pile and put them on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:MastersStrike.NAME: Master's Strike
${ModID}:MastersStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each Upgrade on ALL your cards.

${ModID}:ScrapMetal.NAME: Scrap Metal
${ModID}:ScrapMetal.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card from any pile for every !M! Block you have. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlacksmithsShield.NAME: Blacksmith's Shield
${ModID}:BlacksmithsShield.DESCRIPTION: After you play a card, gain 1 Block for each Upgrade on it.

${ModID}:Masterwork.NAME: Masterwork
${ModID}:Masterwork.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Upgrade a card{!M!|2= twice|>2= !M! times}. NL Can Upgrade cards any number of times. NL stslib:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
